website_summaries.verdict: A good budget model for a saucer chair with good design options that fit with most decors.
pros: Plush fabric sports a faux fur feel for extra comfort
Powder-coated frame resists rust from water and weather when placed outdoors
cons: Runs on the smaller size, making it more suitable for children and young teenagers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One in pink and one in teal. They are good quality and super soft material. Very comfy! They fold up for storage and easily fit under twin beds. I bought these for my daughters who are 4 & 7 y/o and they are the perfect size. I am 5' 2 and occasionally take a seat in one and fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steevies_Dizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten these chairs before I decided to buy two bean bag ones. So far they have lasted way longer and my kids love them. I purchased a pink and blue one. One came faster than the other but I couldn't be happier with my purchase. These are well worth the price and very sturdy. I love the soft material covering the seats. I may have to purchase one for myself. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Positively Red Quicksand
customer_reviews.text: Yep. That's how comfortable it is. I can't tell anyone how many times I dosed off in this chair while watching Netflix, or trying to watch Netflix for that matter. My only gripe concerning comfort is I use this chair for gaming. Hence the two pillows which I always keep on the chair. Also, and this is minor, the black caps (not sure what they're called) continuously fall off somehow every now and then. They can be placed back on easily with a little bit of manual pressure by hand. Other than that, the chair's very comfortable. Furthermore, it's durable and sturdy. I've had this chair for 3 years and going, and I remain happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: vAtom_Antv

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old niece for her birthday. She looooooooves it. It's super soft and comfy and I could even sit in it all day. It's plenty big for an adult and also great for kids. She really wanted a "cool" chair for her room, and when I researched these types of chairs the others were all quite a bit higher priced than this one so it's a deal.
customer_reviews.author: KHsuperwomanTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves her chair.
customer_reviews.text: 11 y/o Daughter loves her new chair. Looks and feels sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Big George

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 8 year old daughter's room. She loves it. It's a lot more soft and comfortable than I thought. I've sat in it comfortably too (I'm 4'11" and 105 pounds.)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Chair is red, not pink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old daughter’s room. The size is perfect for her, and it fits me fine as well (120 lb adult). It is comfortable. My problems lie in the wobbliness of chair and the misleading color. In the picture it shows a pink that is very close to the color of my daughter’s rug (the whole reason I chose this chair), but when I received it I was extremely disappointed that it’s basically red :( it does not match with anything in her room. This is NOT the product that I paid so much money for!! Either send people the correct color or change the misleading photo to a more accurate one! I’m not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid chair
customer_reviews.text: The base is wide and of a good weight to minimize tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Haflett

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair for my 11 year old daughter. The chair was too small, smaller than expected. I immediately turned in a return order and owner never got back to me. Now the time to return has passed. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPS sucks for delivery
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not faux fur more of a suede type material..still very comfortable. Also UPS delivered and it was damaged when it arrived.box had tears and rips and there was a mark on the chair as shown in picture above.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: Full size saucer chair, I bought this for my 8 year old. She adores it and it matches her room, the only dislike I have is that the fur top part does not come off to wash. But luckily I have a carpet attachment. Very sturdy as I am 180 and have sat in it a time or two.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: A little small for an adult but really cute and perfect as an extra accent chair.
customer_reviews.author: jayrah

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Too SMALL for anyone over the age of 9!!!!! If you try to return it they charge a 20% restock Fee!! Plus you have to pay for shipping on the return!! DONT BUY THIS- trust me!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa  c

customer_reviews.title: One satisfied mommy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my daughters room update I'm currently working on. One in pink and one in Teal. Both came in two days. Surprised my daughters with them and they have to be told to get in bed when it's time for bed. They have tried sleeping in them several nights. Very happy mommy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Looked like it had been ran over by a car!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ripped, torn, damaged, with a huge black grease stain on the area.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am sure it will be well received as a CHRISTMAS GIFT........... beautiful plush covering.....seems well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Roger of Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is surprisingly comfy! No bar in the back if your legs cutting off circulation like some models... I love the ease of folding it up. Good product and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just what a  Queen Diva needs to sit in!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for 7 yr old great grand daughter. She does not allow anyone to sit upon her throne! Especially when dressed in all her royal fashion. The Queen Diva is obeyed by all! (about the chair anyway)
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair, for smaller people.
customer_reviews.text: Cute in red - it really brightens up my office. Practical? Eh, not so much for an adult. It's rather small and only holds something like 200 or 250 lbs. It's fairly comfy for a smaller person, but very squeaky to sit in (because of the fuzzy fabric).
customer_reviews.author: BknBridge

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding service and product what else can you ask
customer_reviews.text: The Vendor Bargain-Ben went out of his way to correct a mistake I made, I forgot to check the mailing address of the colection point near the border, They had change their address, I noticed the day after I received the shipped notice. The chair is awesome my wife is very happy and therefor so am I Thank you very much Bargain Ben You are great.
customer_reviews.author: Remoris

customer_reviews.title: Soft but small
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as pictured. Very soft and comfy. A bit smaller than I'd expected. I'm only 5' tall and it's barely big enough for me. Find for a child but not an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and great quality. Looks really nice in my granddaughters pink room.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Need better package.
customer_reviews.text: Need better packaging box came destroy holes everywhere if it would have been raining it would have gotten wet ridiculous the should put the chair in a plastic bag I thought for sure it would have been dirty or rip but thanks god it was not my daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: yine

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable. The color is very vibrant and it came fully assembled. Not sure why those chairs cost so much but very cute.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but tips over all the time, isn’t very comfortable and had it for a month and the side of the fabric ripped open
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Choose this over a bean bag chair. No fear of a mess then
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter chose this for her birthday and lives it! Wanted a beanbag chair and I talked her out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Seys

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, especially for the price. Even old fumble fingers here could set it up in a few seconds. Comfortable and cozy mama-san or baby-san chair.
customer_reviews.author: Observer One

customer_reviews.title: nice chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a good buy. it is very comfortable, if a little bit small. It does come in several diferent coclors, they are just on seperate pages. it is nice and sturdy and is a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: momof7

customer_reviews.title: The chair was lovely and fits easily in the car to take along and also fits ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair was lovely and fits easily in the car to take along and also fits nicely in my granddaughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very UNCOMFORTABLE. Poorly made as the threading is sloppy (see photo.) This product is not sturdy, very unstable and flimsy when you sit in it. I would not purchase this product unless you are looking for just another piece of junk for your next garage sale. Very disappointed and I made the mistake of buying two.
customer_reviews.author: Dobecropper

customer_reviews.title: Princess on her throne.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter requested this chair for her birthday so she could sit and watch the birds out of her window. She truly love the chair and compares herself to a Princess. Thank you for making her smile over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: neked truth

customer_reviews.title: Not really an adult size
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair, maybe it said small and I didn't see it, fits more for a smaller person
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Just want we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. Perfect for my 8 year olds room. Soft fabric, easy to collapse, gorgeous pink color. Some others I had looked at were too large for her room, this was just the right size to not take up too much room and she can still cuddle her whole body in it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Feather

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I found this chair very comfortable and I'm sure my granddaughter will as well once she opens it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Came Well Before Time
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect chair for my bedroom and hopefully for my dorm. Pros : Lightweight, sturdy, comfortable, brightly colored (I ordered the aqua one), easily folds up for storage, and it was easy to set up. Cons : My cat has a live affair with it too, so I have to share
customer_reviews.author: Garlicbread

customer_reviews.title: great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: great chair for the price. this was purchased to hold a very large stuffed animal in my kid's room.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Chair was fine luckily even though it was almost all the way open and damaged on the box when we received it

customer_reviews.title: i love to sit in it in my free time
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so comfy!! It’s so soft.i love to sit in it in my free time.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought chair for 12-year old birthday. Great addition to her bedroom. She loves the color. Sturdy enough for a teen, but caution a full figured adult from sitting in chair.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them they are comfortable and very vibrant colors like the pictures

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any kid under 10.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loves this chair. She won't let anyone else sit on it.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This chair was exactly as pictured. Beautiful colour, very soft and comfortable material. It was also quite sturdy and can comfortably seat/hold an adult. My 11 year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Persad

customer_reviews.title: ... it using it every day since received and I loved that it came assembled
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old loves it using it every day since received and I loved that it came assembled! So easy to fold and take wherever you want
customer_reviews.author: Brian Madanski

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and exactly what I expected. Bought for my grandson (toddler) to sit it while watching tv. Definitely not for a large adult, but I knew that based on description and from reviews I read prior to purchase. Would give 5 stars, but padding could be a slight bit more padded.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bee

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is a folding chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her saucer chair. I like that it is a folding chair. It makes it easy to move it from room to room. This chair has held up well to my daughter's heavy use of it and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, just as shown in the picture. Very soft and comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, long lasting

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves her chair!
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy enough for an adult, colorful. Pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It's small. Fits a kid, but definitely not a teenager nor an adult.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful, soft chair. The color looks great in my daughter's room. It's stable also. My husband and I both can sit in it comfortably.

customer_reviews.title: The Cozy Chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a really comfortable nice chair. It is not really huge but just right, and if you need a comfortable fill in chair, then this is the one.

customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable but looked a lot smaller than the picture showed.

customer_reviews.title: Aqua chair - exactly as pictured

customer_reviews.title: it is quite comfortable for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: The image is very clearly red, but what I received was a fuchsia pink chair. Aside from that, it is quite comfortable for a toddler, but would not recommend it for an adult. The plush padding is very soft. Chair folds easily.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: It is not incredibly comfortable, but it is comfortable enough

customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice chair, the material is very soft. But it tips backwards and to the sides very easily. If you lean to the left or right, expect to end up on the floor!

customer_reviews.title: Okay chair for the intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my 6 year old daughter's bedroom. The pros: It is fully assembled and a good size for a size 6 year old. It is colorful and matches the décor of her room. The cons: The pink fur cover is not removable so the cover cannot be washed in a washing machine. The chair is definitely not large enough for an adult and I highly doubt a teen would fit comfortably. There should be an age or weight recommendation in the listing as the chair is smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ella's mom

customer_reviews.title: super soft, and gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: Comfy chair, super soft, and gorgeous color! I sip my morning coffee on it!

customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it, she is 11 years old and it fits just fine (for now). the only issue I have is that like other reviewers mentioned, it is a bit pricey compared to Walmart, who I later found carries the brand "Mainstays" in its stores and on-line. Although this certain seller beats the delivery time than that of walmart.com

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accent chair
customer_reviews.text: This product is an awesome accent to a dull place. Its also great for limited space because you can fold up out of the way. It is a great purchase! Also it arrived very quickly with standard shipping.
customer_reviews.author: 85Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfy Reading Chair for Children!
customer_reviews.text: Both my children love to cuddle up with a blanket in their soft reading chairs in their rooms! You can not beat the price and they were perfect for what we wanted. It is really not for a adult but for my 7 and 8 year old ...they love them. And I am sure they will last us for awhile. Having a perfect reading chair makes reading fun!
customer_reviews.author: LHP

customer_reviews.title: It is a tiny bit small but me and all of my friends fit perfectly in it and don't feel like the chair is going to break or colla
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5'4 200lbs and in a college dorm room. It is a tiny bit small but me and all of my friends fit perfectly in it and don't feel like the chair is going to break or collapse. It is very lightweight and can easily be moved around. It says that it is still shipping it to me, but I already got it about a week ago. So just plan for about a week to a week and a half early shipping even if you choose the regular time. This chair is super soft and I find it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Luxury Padded Faux-Fur Saucer Chair, (Aqua)
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1| Color:AquaWhether you are studying, hanging out with friends or just lounging around, this Mainstays Faux-Fur Saucer Chair is the perfect addition to any room. This cozy saucer chair is a perfect decorative addition to update any room with the very soft, fun faux-fur fabric. Mainstays Faux-Fur Saucer Chair is the perfect addition to any room. No assembly required. Mainstays Faux-Fur Saucer Chair: Soft, wide seat Foldable steel frame Cool faux-fur fabric Great for lounging, dorms or any room 100 percent polyester upholstery Weight capacity: 225 lbs No assembly required Dimensions: 30"L x 28"W x 29"H
